panels.description:
A floating value that describes
how much the client is using the
volume. 

Possible values:

• 0: The client is not using the
volume.

• 100: The client is using their
maximum.

• gt 100% : The client is using their
burst.
panels.title: Average Utilization %

panels.description:
The total read operations percentage to the
volume since the creation of the
volume.
panels.title: Overall %Read

panels.description:
The total cumulative write
operations percentage to the volume since
the creation of the volume.
panels.title: Overall %Write

panels.description:
The average time, in
microseconds, to complete
operations to the volume in the
last 500 milliseconds. A "0"
(zero) value means there is no
I/O to the volume.
panels.title: solidfire_volume_latency_seconds

panels.description:
A floating value that describes
how much the client is using the
volume. Possible values:

- 0: The client is not using the
volume.

- 100: The client is using their
maximum.

 - gt 100: The client is using their
burst.
panels.title: solidfire_volume_utilization

panels.description:
The total number of IOP credits
available to the user. When
volumes are not using up to the
configured maxIOPS, credits are
accrued.
panels.title: solidfire_volume_burst_iops_credit

panels.description:
The average size in bytes of
recent I/O to the volume in the
last 500 milliseconds.
panels.title: solidfire_volume_average_iop_size_bytes

panels.description:
The current actual IOPS to the
volume in the last 500
milliseconds.
panels.title: solidfire_volume_actual_iops

panels.description:
The average time, in
microseconds, to complete read
operations to the volume in the
last 500 milliseconds
panels.title: solidfire_volume_read/write_latency_usec

panels.description:
The number of outstanding read
and write operations to the
volume.
panels.title: solidfire_volume_client_queue_depth

panels.description:
The total cumulative unaligned
read operations to a volume
since the creation of the volume.

The total cumulative unaligned
write operations to a volume
since the creation of the volume
panels.title: solidfire_volume_unaligned_reads_total/writes

panels.description:
A floating value between 0 and 1
that represents how much the
system is throttling clients below
their maxIOPS because of rereplication of data, transient
errors, and snapshots taken
panels.title: solidfire_volume_throttle
